== isin.m ==
Check if a table contains values of another table

[http://guillaumemaze.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/matlab/codes/matrix/isin.m Download here]

{{{
% isin Check if a table contains values of another table
%
% [C,IA,IB] = isin(A,B)
% 
% Check if table A contains values of table B.
%	C: Values of A containing values of B.
%	IA: C = A(IA)
%	IB: C = B(IB)
%
% Created: 2011-11-07.
% All rights reserved.
